column4: checking for Qt... Qt not installed. Make sure Qt 3.x is installed before proceeding
i loaded a new tar file of openkiosk
checking for Qt... Qt not installed. Make sure Qt 3.x is installed before proceeding
is there any other way to install QT
erm... there are QT lib packages etc.
there are qt3 libs etc theer
it depends what you mean by install qt3 ;-)
well... you trying te  _compile from source_  open kiosk ?
if that is the case you will need to install all the relevant -dev  versions of the packages etc.
well... is there a package for something similar (in requirements) in ubuntu-dapper as the  open kiosk ?
if so, you can 'sudo apt-get build-dep (package)' and it will install all the necessities to compile that (package)
hareem  you may find libqt3-mt-dev  and such ilke packages....
